news.title: Eli Lilly hikes 2025 outlook, tops quarterly estimates as Mounjaro, Zepbound sales soar
news.summary: Eli Lilly hiked its 2025 guidance and posted second-quarter earnings that topped estimates. Strong demand for its blockbuster weight loss and diabetes drugs.

news.title: Intel shares drop after Trump calls for CEO to resign immediately
news.summary: Intel shares were under pressure Thursday after President Donald Trump called for the chipmaker's CEO to resign immediately. Intel shares wereunder pressure Thursday following President Trump's call for the CEO's resignation.

news.title: Trump order will allow alternative assets like cryptocurrencies, private equity in 401(k)s
news.summary: The executive order will direct the U.S. Secretary of Labor to review fiduciary guidance on private market investments in 401(k) and other defined-contribution plans.

news.title: What the world's biggest chipmakers are doing to stave off Trump's tariffs
news.summary: Shares of major chip stocks rose as investors bet these companies' U.S. investments may help mitigate President Trump's proposed 100% semiconductor tariffs.

news.title: Democrats question Google's Trump talks over censorship suit and possible 'quid-pro-quo' deal
news.summary: A group of Democratic senators wrote a letter to Google expressing concern over a possible settlement between the company and President Trump. The letter was part of a letter from the senators to Google CEO Sundar Pichai.

news.title: There are few assets hated like coal — why this dirty fuel may have a future
news.summary: The stocks are cheap and demand demise predictions are coming down. Is coal making a comeback? The stocks are Cheap and Demand Demise predictions are Coming down. The coal stocks are cheaper and demand Demises are Coming Down.

news.title: Trump calls for Intel’s CEO to go. Lawmakers have focused on his ties to China.
news.summary: Intel stock is falling as Trump’s comments open the door for potentially more leadership drama at the chip giant. Intel stock is down 2.7% on Monday.

news.title: Still no sign of rising layoffs in jobless claims. U.S. has a low-hire, low-fire labor market.
news.summary: As long as most people who have a job keep their jobs, they are likely to continue to spend at levels that support a growing economy and stave off a recession.

news.title: Moon exploration company Firefly’s IPO pricing shows investor demand keeps rising
news.summary: Space exploration company Firefly Aerospace’s stock is set to begin trading on the Nasdaq under the ticker symbol “FLY” following its upsized IPO.

news.title: Eli Lilly’s weight-loss pill didn’t work so well, and the stock is tumbling
news.summary: Lilly’s stock was tumbling as disappointing trial data for an oral weight-loss pill offset an upbeat earnings report and outlook.
